rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTC1110, BTF1010, BTP1010, BTW1200}

description: This unit introduces the student to the salient features of the Malaysian legal system, the various dispute resolution techniques and examines the main areas of law that regulate the business environment in Malaysia. The focus of learning is on the law of contract, the law of misrepresentation, agency law, partnership law and aspects of company law. Comparative aspects of Australian laws will be highlighted where relevant.
